UnitedHealth 称 Change Healthcare 数据泄露导致 1 亿数据被盗https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/unitedhealth-says-data-of-100-million-stolen-in-change-healthcare-breach/ Thu, 24 Oct 2024 23:54:56 -0400劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯SecurityHealthcare https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/unitedhealth-says-data-of-100-million-stolen-in-change-healthcare-breach/ UnitedHealth has confirmed for the first time that over 100 million people had their personal information and healthcare data stolen in the Change Healthcare ransomware attack, marking this as the largest healthcare data breach in recent years.
